org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.deployer

Class DefaultReleaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.skipper.server.deployer.DefaultReleaseManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReleaseManager

    public class DefaultReleaseManager
extends Object
implements ReleaseManager
    A ReleaseManager implementation that uses an AppDeployer and CF manifest based deployer.
    Author:
    Mark Pollack, Ilayaperumal Gopinathan

      • createReport

        public ReleaseAnalysisReport createReport(org.springframework.cloud.skipper.domain.Release existingRelease,
                                          org.springframework.cloud.skipper.domain.Release replacingRelease,
                                          boolean initial,
                                          boolean isForceUpdate,
                                          List<String> appNamesToUpgrade)
        Description copied from interface: ReleaseManager
        Create a report of what apps should be updated and deleted upon upgrade. The return value is expected to be passed into the update method.
        Specified by:
        createReport in interface ReleaseManager
        Parameters:
        existingRelease - the existing release that is deployed
        replacingRelease - the release that is to be deployed in place of the existing release
        initial - the flag indicating this is initial report creation
        isForceUpdate - the flag indicating the upgrade is by force
        appNamesToUpgrade - the application names to force upgrade
        Returns:
        a report describing the actions to take to update

      • status

        public org.springframework.cloud.skipper.domain.Release status(org.springframework.cloud.skipper.domain.Release release)
        Description copied from interface: ReleaseManager
        Get the status of the release, by querying the database. The ReleaseStateUpdateService is scheduled ot update the state in the database periodically.
        Specified by:
        status in interface ReleaseManager
        Parameters:
        release - the release to update state for
        Returns:
        the updated release
